name: Road Haulage Association
legal: Trading Association and UK Limited Company
goal: To advance the image and standards of the UK road haulage industry both nationally and internationally.
interests: Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
The Mobility Package and all other initiatives connected with road haulage, road infrastructre and ancillary activities.
Posting of workers.
